items.sentence: Tom has been in the Boston office the last three years.
Tom has been living here alone for the past six months.
I\'m sorry things didn\'t work out between you and Tom.
It\'s perfectly natural that Tom would want to do that.
It\'s probably not a good idea to do what Tom suggests.
It\'s very unusual for Tom to be here this time of day.
There are a lot of things I have to do before tomorrow.
Why does the phone always ring when I\'m taking a bath?
I\'ve never trusted Tom and I don\'t think I ever will.
French is the only foreign language I\'m able to speak.
Tom doesn\'t have to talk to me if he doesn\'t want to.
We have a meeting today at 2:30. It\'ll be a short one.
We haven\'t had those kinds of problems in a long time.
We overlooked Tom\'s name when we sent out invitations.
We probably don\'t want to do that again any time soon.
I wish I could figure out how to embed a YouTube video.
I wonder how many people in Australia can speak French.
Is there something in particular that you want to know?
It was a lot more expensive than I thought it would be.
Does Tom know that you don\'t know how to speak French?
